result.reason: Current behavior destroys a session tab immediately on disconnect, which removes context and makes quick switching/reconnect workflows harder as described by commenters.
result.approach: Decouple tab lifetime from live connection state by keeping the tab after disconnect, showing a lightweight 'connection closed' state in that tab, and preserving selected-connection tracking so users can switch or reconnect from the same context.
